website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy round massage bolster that will hold up well to extensive use.
pros: Quality construction that holds up well over time
cons: May be too large to be comfortable for some users

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Feel like an EARTHLITE product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a massage therapist and have used earthlite products in the past and this doesn't feel anything like any of the earthlite products I've used. It feels extremely cheap smells like chemicals and is way too stiff. I am returning this item. I never write one star reviews but I was truly looking forward to using this bolster in my practice and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Oltman

customer_reviews.title: No earthlite tag or brand anywhere on the bolster
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as Earthlite but does not have Earthlite brand anywhere on it. Makes me wonder if it is a knock off copy :-/ Functional but I paid for earthlite for the brand reputation. Wish I got Earthlite branded bolster
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Returning and not repurchasing based on principle
customer_reviews.text: Too small. It is not 26” long like description states. Plus, not good knee support for male adult. I will be returning. Looks and appears good quality. Make sure you try before opening sealed bag like I did. I would have given it more stores, but VERY UPSET I need to pay to return. I was going to buy 9” and see how that worked but forget it now. If return policy isn’t clearly defined or product descriptions are not accurate, vendors are going to lose my business. I’ve been a Prime member for way to long. Amazon QC and vendor vetting needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Thad H

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and I like the color that I have (green)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bolster quite a while ago for a previous purpose. At this time, I have recently received a total knee replacement. Many of the exercises for post knee replacement suggest using a rolled up towel. Well, I have found that this bolster serves the same purpose and is a very convenient substitute. It is well made and I like the color that I have (green). I highly recommend it for a variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Tulane Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Like lying down on a dish towel
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price, but it is way too soft. I used it once and put it in the closet to return later. Unfortunately, I missed the cutoff for return and will probably end up spending whatever I saved to buy additional foam or filler at the fabric store to stuff it. Whatever material was used to fill the bolster was too light or not enough. It gave little to no support. More like a soft pillow rather than the sturdy bolsters onhand at my yoga studio. It would make a good body pillow, but if you are looking for a solid support to use for stretching keep looking. This is not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Fair-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Bolster to help relieve back pain when sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a knee Bolster while sleeping to relieve pressure on my lower back. I've had back surgery and find that if I put this under my knees when sleeping on my back and in between my legs (at knees) when sleeping on my side, that it helps relieve pressure on my lower back and I don't wake up with back pain. The last one I had, I uses for many years, but over time it got a little flattened out in middle. Instead of trying to find replacement foam insert, I just bought this one. So far it works great as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ritch Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Earthlite is an excellent company and this is no exception
customer_reviews.text: Earthlite is an excellent company and this is no exception. I did remove the thin plastic bag around the inner foam and the tags inside but most people might not notice that. Perfect firmness and love the price.
customer_reviews.author: MassageMom

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product. It is very well-made. The color was exactly as I expected., a light grey. Very firm & looks nice. I’ll be using it in my spa. I have not used it yet, but hopefully it keeps its form. It’s so nice to receive something of quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Theophilus

customer_reviews.title: VERY USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I ordered one in black and now purchased a white one. The bolster is useful for keeping my back relaxed while lying in bed. I also us it to flex my knee to tape it for physical therapy which I do every other day.
customer_reviews.author: DKP

customer_reviews.title: nice bolster
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and my bolsters started leaving flakes of the cover all over my sheets and recovering was not an option, this is just the right size for the ankles and contrary to other reviews mine is an Earthlite product if i have any issues with it will update this review
customer_reviews.author: NancyLiz

customer_reviews.text: It took 6 and a half years to wear down the vinyl on my last bolster. I work in two locations so I still use it. I bought this one to reduce the amount of things I'm toting back and forth. I am 100% satisfied with this product and will order from this seller again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Nico Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: A full round firm bolster
customer_reviews.text: I like how firm the bolster is and it’s good quality for such a low price. I’ve been using it for about 3 months now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good body position and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful, it’s well made and very sturdy. While the extremities have been deformed a little bit it is a good item.
customer_reviews.author: itzel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Well made. A little stiff. I use it between my legs for sleeping sideways or under my knee, to ease back pain. The memory foam pillows usually flatten out in the night which doesn't help. This keeps its form. It's not for folks who want soft cushy things. It's on the firm side.
customer_reviews.author: ridere46

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: While this is not overly soft, it does it's job. It is just the right size to support the knees or ankles of my clients.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMia

customer_reviews.title: Matches my table, exactly
customer_reviews.text: I've had my earthlite table for over 7 years and was surprised that the color matches exactly the table! And bolster is as strong as my last one.
customer_reviews.author: dmr

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a knee bolster, the handle makes it easy to reposition. Foam is soft enough to be comfortable. The only potential con that I observed at this point is that the "buttery soft" upholstery seems a little thin and may not wear well. Time will tell. Fortunately, the product is priced well for easy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 6 Inch Bolster
customer_reviews.text: Used in my massage therapy class. Supports the legs and doesn't compress too much. This works well for it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This product will compress almost entirely when weight is applied. Its 6" diameter will easily squash down to a little less than 1" with minimal pressure. An absolute piece of crap, designed with one purpose in mind - to extract money from the purchaser. If you like paying for stuff that has no practical use except for taking up space, this is the product for you. i bought this because of other reviews that said it was too hard, which would have been fine with me. it would seem that either there are serious quality control problems at Earthlite, or these are cheap knockoffs. Either way, let the buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: kikipierre

customer_reviews.title: Timely shipping!
customer_reviews.text: As a MT earthlite is on of my favorite brands, product is exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Drew DeGroat

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. This is a fairly large bolster but works really well under the knees and ankles while on a table. I used it with a cotton pillowcase made for bolsters and it fits nice and snug and is comfortable. It is also fairly firm and seems to hold up well. I would say it is good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Stays puffy
customer_reviews.text: It has been a while since I have ordered a bolster. The circumference is a little more than my previous one. The piece that covers the zipper protrudes more than the one I am used to from Oakworks. I try to remember to put the zipper side down.
customer_reviews.author: bjeanconn

customer_reviews.title: Firm product worth the value
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my girlfriends massage table and it holds up to the abuse or daily use. If you're looking for a solid product with comfort and support this is what you're seeking. i've been on the bed myself and its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah B. Commons

customer_reviews.title: Great for massages
customer_reviews.text: Great for massages. I use this for school. It’s the perfect length and has the right amount of stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the softness and feel of the cover material. It is helpful with knee and back support.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great for under clients knees
customer_reviews.text: I have a few older clients that have back issues and can't lie with their legs flat while I work on them. I got this because it's a big bigger than some others online and it's pretty firm so it doesn't sag under their knees. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I do an energy therapy session. Great piece of equipment to have handy. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This bolster pillow is used to elevate my legs, under my knees and works well. It's easy to clean and sturdy- so holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for back sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was just firm enough. The first one I bought was too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: huskersssssss

customer_reviews.title: Firm, lightweight, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use these to bolster the back pillows on my sofa. The vinyl is nice because it doesn't cling to dog hair and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and does a great job, used it for myself and clients. Will buy a slip cover to personalize.
customer_reviews.author: WendyCobelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and she uses it all the time for actual therapy massage work. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Knee pain relief when I stand up.
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I’m not lying flat on bed and watching TV or reading. Helps my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. I highly recommend it (except for use as a regular bed bolster pillow because of the fabric).
customer_reviews.author: CatMac

customer_reviews.title: cleaning products eating cover
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning products we have to use for Covid eat the covers off of these. Make sure you don't mix it too strong. Spray it on the rag, not the bolster. We'll see how they hold up from here.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Schick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my lash extension and Microblading clients. They love it. Clients are very comfortable during the session.
customer_reviews.author: TLR

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Great but smaller than expected..just came in today so I haven't tested it out on my clients... looks good enough, I guess I just expected better
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Knee support
customer_reviews.text: Especially good for supporting under knees when laying flat on back!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Gesser

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife happy life
customer_reviews.text: My wife had therapy exercises that needed this shape and support. She’s happy so I am too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: confortable
customer_reviews.text: feels just right no matter where i place it under my body. feels like whatever material and cushioning was use to fabricate was just right. wish it came in other vivid colors
customer_reviews.author: nina the ballerina

customer_reviews.title: Great product for knees and back.
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the one I use at physical therapy. Love the support it gives my knees and back.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Travirca

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I only buy bolsters from earthlite because their products are top notch! Love the size!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Snyder

customer_reviews.title: easy to use under knees or feet
customer_reviews.text: I slide this under the table warmer and sheets for clients. So much easier than pillows. Plus clients still benefit from the heated pad it slides under, keeping the whole body warm when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Marie

customer_reviews.title: holds its shape
customer_reviews.text: you can complete smash this for hours and it will expand right back to normal. very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jayy

customer_reviews.title: best result for me lay my leg aligned with bolster,
customer_reviews.text: came kwik ,i started to use very 1st night and using it since,stays firm so far and like colour.
customer_reviews.author: dmitriy G goncharenko

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as at PT office
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Was recommended to grab one by my PT, and this seems almost identical to the one I use at their clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Just what my PT ordered! It helps stretch my back out and also helps raise my legs up when exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband in his car. Says it is 12", not! It is more like 16. Wouldn't fit. Looked like nice quality, but too big for my need.
customer_reviews.author: suz15

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bolster is the perfect size to put under legs to make a client more comfortable. The material feels comfortable enough to forego a bolster cover.
customer_reviews.author: S. Billups

customer_reviews.title: Hard and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Some describe this as firm but I would describe it as hard and incredibly uncomfortable. Not worth using for rest or sleep. One can find knee support without feeling like you’ve planted your knees on a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Soric

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase for my aching knees
customer_reviews.text: Love this! There’s No more locking of the knees when I sleep! I either prop it under my knees for back sleeping or prop my feet on it for stomach sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great after hip surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had hip surgery a few years back and it was bothering me at night. I bought this to use between my knees when on my side, which works great, but also realized it helped if it was under my knees when sleeping on my back. No hip pain with this little tweak. Now I need to make some kind of cover for it as it is polyester and plastic-y. But it is for massage tables so I'm sure it is meant for easy clean up and deoderizing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY Lady

customer_reviews.title: It's a good quality of bolster but in terms of size
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality of bolster but in terms of size, it's a bit too chunky. Most of my clients found it not that comfortable unless they are taller than 5 foot 8.......I thought it would go nicely with my Earthlite massage table.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back and side sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Good firmness for sleeping - not so hard that it cuts off circulation and not so soft that it squishes away to nothing. I tried another brand before and it didn't last very long until it became permanently squished, this one is lasting much better. The cover it comes with is for the massage table, you need to put a soft cover like cotton over it for use in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Udo

customer_reviews.title: Really holds up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bolster on January 9, 2011 as I needed a second bolster while in school. This item has held up very well after over 2 years of use. It is just as firm and has retained its round shape as when I originally bought it and that is after using it with almost every client in school clinic and in my current practice. When I ever need to replace one of my bolsters or if I find a need for another one, I will not hesitate to purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Hardzog

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bolster for the price.  Coating started to flake away after a few years.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bolster. I got my money's worth. The coating started to flake away over time, but I guess you get what you pay for. I bought another similar one and I'll try again.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaLoveToSave

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Will work well with my massage practice.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Black Full Round Bolster and it came exactly as pictured! I only gave it 4 stars on pain relief and comfort because it is very firm and both categories vary per client/customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality made and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Had back surgery recently and was advised by therapist to buy a bolster.Have used it for days now and working very well. Very pleased with quality and price was reasonable .It’s firmer than other ones I have looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Quality of roll is good
customer_reviews.text: I did my exercises on it yesterday with the therapist and she said it was good quality. I have not worked with it enough to give it a long term rating so will add another comment after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: MPage

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as specified, but the carrier that delivered the box left it on my doorstep in the pouring rain. Although the bolster was in a plastic bag inside the box, I still needed to take the cover off the bolster and let it dry out for a couple of days. It is fine now, and works well. It is firm, but not hard.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Made out of material easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is made well and fits well under your knees
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Not Earthlite
customer_reviews.text: This is a bolster, but no where does it say Earthlite.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Not an Earthlite product
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a knock-off bolster. It is just okay in quality and does the job but it is simply foam wrapped in plastic wrapped in a cheap pleather lining. I have an actually Earthlite bolster that is cushier and the lining is a softer pleather. You'e already spending the money, get a nice bolster.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Israel

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: good overall product. A little on the stiff side, but it's new. We bought a flannel cover to keep it protected. We use it for massages on our massage table.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gorga

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and works well. The only downfall is that the vinyl covering gets sticky if I try to use this against my skin without a cloth covering over it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Too small and short
customer_reviews.text: I should of checked the measurements. This bolster is shorter and smaller then my current half round bolster. I would send it back if I hand't thrown out the packaging. Next time I will compare closer. The core is more like styrofoam then foam rubber. This will see a new owner and i will get another with bigger size and shape from another supplier.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. FrostTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Nice and firm and doesn’t seem to break down too easily. It’s just a little bit shorter than I would prefer but no worries at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far, all my clients love it! It does look&feel deflated slightly by the end of a 7hr work day but still comfortable and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria N.

customer_reviews.title: Ok bolster.
customer_reviews.text: The size is good for men. A little bit to large for female clients. Only has grab strap on one side, Wish both sides had strap.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby sonntag

customer_reviews.title: not very firm
customer_reviews.text: Well made bolster, easy to hold and use, but I needed something quite a bit firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Not just for health purposes!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 big dogs. When we travel and take them with us I fold the back seats flat. There is a "gully" between the 2nd seat and 3rd seat. Makes it hard for them. I used to stuff blankets in it. I bought 2 of these and they are perfect! I know this is not as important as people who use them for health issues, but to our dogs and us it makes life easier!
customer_reviews.author: K. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition
customer_reviews.text: After completing a basement workout room, I could not find a decent jury-rigged bolster for prone exercises. I was hesitant to purchase a bolster as they are not cheap, but I am completely satisfied with this model. It gives the necessary height and firmness for exercising legs, and the cover is durable, comfortable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firmness for to put under a client's knees or ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect firmness for to put under a client's knees or under a client's ankles. i completely recommend this. And, I was afraid it would be too wimpy (soft). It is not too soft...and, it's not hard either.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: So far, very good!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bolster very fast and began using it right away. Have used it to give professional massages about ten times so far, and it has worked very well. It appears to be of good quality, and the handles on both ends make it easy to slide in and out. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars is that it's too soon to tell how well it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Heidicker Brown

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bolster. Ordered for my massage table as my other one was worn down. It's nice and firm and keeps clients' legs and feet comfortable and off the table for bodywork. I've gotten lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I wish it was just a bit longer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wish it was just a bit longer, but it is the best possible option i have found on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! A lot of support for my knees and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! A lot of support for my knees and I can use it as a soft support for Yoga and other activities.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this bolster to people who don't use it often ...
customer_reviews.text: I work at a spa that has its own massage tables and bolsters so I don't use my personal ones very much, just on friends and family. I bought the full round bolster because the reviews for the half round said that it flattens quickly. I wouldn't recommend this bolster to people who don't use it often because it is just too big. I think that half round would have been better for those that aren't using it often. Other than it being too big, it is a good quality bolster
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing it’s squishy and great for my knee. Thank you to my massage therapist for recommending this for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size bolster
customer_reviews.text: This bolster fits my 30" treatment table perfect and is great for larger leg patients that need that extra distance to fit comfortably on the bolster, yet the diameter is small enough for my smaller leg patients, too. Bolster fits perfect under my 30" table when not in use. Material is easy to keep clean. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Very firm, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very firm...more so than I had expected. That being said, the quality is very good and the cover is nice. I use it under my knees when my back is acting up, and it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne H.

customer_reviews.title: Bolster
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as described. It is a perfect addition to my massage practice.
customer_reviews.author: shannon m. holland

customer_reviews.title: This will work for my needs. But I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: This will work for my needs. But I thought it would be harder. It's a little on the soft side.
customer_reviews.author: Sinopa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bolster
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bolster. This is just the right size to go under my clients knees. I like the material and there was no chemical smell. Nice product for a good price. I also have an Earthlite table as well. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Rood

customer_reviews.title: Nice bolster
customer_reviews.text: This bolster has stod up to being dragged to and from school for a year already. I wouldn't say it is man-handled, but it's not treated with kid gloves either. The cushion is still fluffy, and the outside still looks really good. It is a larger bolster which is great under the knees, but a little too big for under the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgovern

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a NYS licensed Massage Therapist, using this product for client support. I decided to take a chance and buy it. This product is exactly what I needed. I only had the half bolster which was not full or long enough but this is both! It is firm enough so that it doesn't collapse under the weight of the client's legs. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I found one so inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The massage store near where i live charges double the price for a bolster. This one here is great. It's very big around which I thought might be uncomfortable, but turns out its great for people with big feet.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: This product is too big to comfortably function as a bolster you can use under your ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is too big to comfortably function as a bolster you can use under your legs while sleeping. I suppose size is relative, but if you are a female and on the small side, this will be too big for you also. I had been traveling for work and unable to return the product and wish I could exchange it for a smaller one as I have never used it; however, the company's return policy won't allow for that. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bolster for my clients to use under their knees during treatment sessions. This one is exactly the right size and density. I like that it's a light color so I can clean it easily and it always looks fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: arrive quickly
customer_reviews.text: The pillow has no give and therefore is too hard and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: It was too big.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this to put under the ankles of my husband while I massage him, it was too big around to feel comfortable during a massage. I even tried it under his knees and it was still too big. Quality though of the product is good. They replied quickly about me returning the product. It is just not my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Restored circulation  in my legs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helps to keep my legs elevated and increases my circulation
customer_reviews.author: ANNIEPICARDI

customer_reviews.title: It does its job. But it is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: It does its job. But it is a little on the harder side. I wish it was softer. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Earthlite fan! I love Earthlite products. I don't have an Earthlite massage table currently but used to and it was certainly an amazing table, well built and comfortable. I've been using this bolster for the last 6 months with my massage clients and it works just as I expect an Earthlite product to work, GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great bolster
customer_reviews.text: Standard size. Provides good squish without sacrificing stability. Great go-to full round bolster.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: This bolster is the perfect size for massage, acupuncture and whatever else one would do to relieve an aching body. I feel anything bigger in diameter would not be in the best interest of the patient,. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NICE bolster. I am a MT and it is nice and firm. Perfect size too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather pappan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good bolster. Wish it was a tiny bit smaller or a little softer and it would be perfect. Reminds me of the hard bolster that my massotherapist uses which is what I wanted for laying in bed watching tv to put under my knees to relieve back pain. It is plasticky but it doesn't bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bolster
customer_reviews.text: Helps support ankles when clients are face down. Durable and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

product_meta.title: EARTHLITE Bolster Pillow Full Round – Durable Massage Bolster, 100% PU Upholstery incl. Strap Handle/Professional Quality for Massage Table/Back Pain Relief
product_meta.description: Making sure your client is comfortable, yet still having the access to reach those sore and tense muscles can be a bit challenging. Stronglite's Full Round 6" X 26" Bolster makes positioning your client properly much easier. These bolsters are made of 100% Polyurethane Vinyl making them oil and waterproof. Stronglite also uses a high density, small cell, but most importantly CFC-free foam for maximum comfort. Your bolster also features a convenient strap on one end that makes it easy to handle. Ideal for Massage Therapy Physical Therapy Sports Massage Rehabilitation Therapy Yoga Pregnancy Material PVC free Upholstery CFC-free Foam Care *When cleaning your product, please remember to use a product that is safe for use on vinyl, a porous surface. Products designed for use on hard surfaces, such as Citrus II, can damage the upholstery and could void your warranty.
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE MASSAGE BOLSTER: Relieves stress on the lower back during massage. Place under knee or ankle to help relieve back strain.
GENEROUSLY SIZED: pair with full sized massage table.
PROFESSIONAL GRADE: Made from quality eco-friendly foam and NATURSOFT 100% PU rayon backed upholstery.
DIMENSIONS AND STYLES: 5 different styles, 8 different colors available. Dimensions can be found in the description.
WARRANTY: 1 year Warranty from EARTHLITE, the world’s leading professional massage therapy supply company, since 1987.
